website_summaries.verdict: The Dell Venue 7 is one of the best small tablet bargains. The larger Venue 8 is just as capable, however there are other 8-inch slates that offer more features for the same price.
pros: The Dell Venue 7 and 8 are refreshingly bloatware-free and start at affordable sub-$200 prices
Performance during casual use is stable and there's a microSD card expansion slot
cons: Performance slows down when downloading app updates or large files
The thick bezels slightly outdate the tablet's design

customer_reviews.title: Set your expectations right.
customer_reviews.text: Set your expectations right. If you are planing to use this tablet as your primary media consumption device. Well, you better look for nvidia shield, nexus 9 or dell venue 8 7000 series. This is a budget device. A lot of reviews are right about lag. You should deactivate some items in Google account sincronization in order to have a decent performance. And also deactivate animations. This is better for a second device not expected to use Gmail. I use mine with fire tv stick and miracast function to view my media content on my tv. Such as FHD movies. I am using Kodi (former XBMC) to view all movies. This was the reason to buy this device.
customer_reviews.author: JOSUE CERNA

customer_reviews.title: had it for a week but returning it. This ...
customer_reviews.text: had it for a week but returning it. This must be a lemon. Tablet freezes and jitters while scrolling. Just reading a magazine locks this thing up. My 3 year old tablet was a speed demon compared to this. Dell needs to go back to the drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and the next day the price dropped almost $50. It is quite slow and buggy. I should have spend a little more and get a better tablet. I guess you get what you pay...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Eduardo Gandara

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet was garbage. I knew right off the bat there were going to be problems when there was stuttering during the registration. In short this tablet is too slow and does not have enough ram to run Kit Kat properly. Chrome crashes, it takes 1 second for the keyboard to popup, etc. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fabian Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: (updated review) this tablet sucks balls
customer_reviews.text: (update review) after a month and a half, this tablet sucks! super slow, need to reset it all the time. just wanna throw it out the window. it's pure crap. don't let the price fool you and how good it works the first few weeks......... trust me i tried everything.... don't buy! Dell released a firmware upgrade. Awesome. Just don't use a custom launcher or google chrome browser and you're good to go. I use dolphin browser and its great. Full HD screen is beautiful. Camera is ok. Sound is hood. Thin. Well built. For $103 its a steal. Disable the bloatware. And get auto ram booster.
customer_reviews.author: tien phan

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it ..... way too laggy, to the point of almost being unusable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this over the holidays to use for basic functions; check email, waste time on candy crush, occasional web browsing. I really wanted to love the device; feels good in the hand, screen is ok. But it is ridiculously slow and laggy. Can take multiple minutes after launching chrome to just get the keyboard to popup. Have used other dell equipment in the past, so really surprised how poor this device is. Not sure if it is because it is an intel processor vs arm, if it is because of the reduced RAM or what but Dell as really produced a loser. Bought the 7" as well and although it performs slightly better it is still very laggy.
customer_reviews.author: William N Rudd

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet, Great Screen, Reasonable Priced
customer_reviews.text: This little tablet is great for light web surfing, email, book reading and listening to music. It is a bit slow on booting and does "stutter" when trying to open or run multiple tasks. I have this tablet and a Samsung Galaxy tab S 8.4 and there is no comparison. However, for the money, this tablet is meets all the needs for general proposes. It is reasonably priced, has a beautiful screen and fits right into the coat pocket or purse. I would buy this tablet again and would recommend it to someone on a tight budget.
customer_reviews.author: robertjonessan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife for every day use. I guess you get what you pay for. My nexus 7 is still running perfectly. This dell tablet is worthless. It's slow and has tons of lag (compared to other devices). I don't recommend it to anyone other then maybe kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only feature I like is the back grip material
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give the tablet a chance since you cannot find 1080p screen in this price range. It was a mistake, the tablet is just not designed well, it lags between screen changes, apps take time to load and sometimes they do not load at all. This might be due the fact that the tablet has only one gig of ram but I had LG tablets that perform without hick-up with the same amount. The only feature I like is the back grip material, it feals very good in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Rokycana

customer_reviews.title: Big Mistake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one reason, so that I could use some of the Android apps that I miss having because my other tablets are Kindles. What they don`t tell you is that of the 1 GB of RAM, the operating system uses 80% of it. I put a couple of apps in before I knew this and it kept freezing up, that is when I called Dell and they explained to me that if I remove the apps plus any of the others that I don`t use it should work fine. The device is useless to me now.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Love my Dell Venue 8
customer_reviews.text: Love my Dell Venue 8! It is my first little tablet i have ever owned but for being the first it is the best! As with all tech that has a screen and doesnt close like laptops. Screen protectors and a case are a must have!Amazon has a great selection of both for this tablet!! The sound is amazing for both the speaker and the headphones! The screen picture is perfect! I got mine in red and it is lovely! Battery life is amazing. The sd card slot makes like easier. I 32gb in right now. Going to get a 64 gb later ^_^. For its price it is an amazing little tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Oswalt

customer_reviews.title: Random lockups and freezes
customer_reviews.text: Returning and taking 9$ charge for return fee. Problems are constant. What's worse is you don't know when an app will crash. I am writing this review on Dell. Firefox crashed while I was writing the review. I am typing it again. I have a 4gb android cheap phone I use. More stable and no crashes. Flixster constantly crashes while playing trailers. I am not sure what's going on. It can't be the CPU/ram. I am guessing its Dell and customization. Disable max audio and skitch. Once in a while everything is smooth and fast. Then comes the slowness and freezes out of the blue. Upgraded to latest. Did factory reset. Nothing worked. Still same errors. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: another guy

customer_reviews.title: it was fine when I used it just for e-mail and Facebook ...
customer_reviews.text: This just wasn't for me.I'm not sure if the one I received may have been a bit defective or if they are just this way. With my experience, it was fine when I used it just for e-mail and Facebook but when I added a few games, it started to lag very bad and I could not play any of the games. Very easy return process, though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Boxed Up for Return 48 Hours After Receipt
customer_reviews.text: I really liked my old Dell Venue 8, so when our new kitten knocked it off the table while it was charging and damaged the charger port beyond repair, I figured I'd just buy a new one. But there's so much bloatware and so little memory that this version of this once fine tablet simply does not work. It's boxed up and ready for return as soon as I drive past a UPS store, and I just bought myself a Samsung Galaxy A this afternoon. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Rabinowitz

customer_reviews.title: Avoid This
customer_reviews.text: This almost got an "I hate it" from me. I have had this tablet for nearly a year. Many of the applications are slow to respond, often closing unexpectedly. Twice I have had major issues. The first time it wouldn't come up at all. I had to send it in for repair. The second time, applications (even those I wasn't using) would crash, including the operating system, making it impossible to use for more than 5 or 10 minutes. I was finally able to keep it active long enough to do an update. I would not purchase this model again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holtz

customer_reviews.title: This product is not good. The low price makes it seem like a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not good. The low price makes it seem like a value but it is not. I brought it for a month overseas to use as my main source of email/Internet. It had trouble connecting to every wifi around. Every single app 'died' in the middle of using it. The screen freezes constantly... The list goes on. Truly a low quality item and I do not recommend its purchase. Spend the extra money and get a better tablet.
customer_reviews.author: pdFarmD

customer_reviews.title: Quit in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I was willing with its general sluggishness, but after about 2 months, it quit. It won't reboot. And, tech support - forget it. Nothing on the web about the problem. Chat? "Our records indicate that Chat is not available for your Venue 3840 product." Phone support? "Our tools" are not available. Call back in 2-3 hours. I got the Dell tablet because my Dell desktop has been so reliable. I'll get another tablet brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: The sensitivity of the touchscreen is terrible though so the keyboard doesn't work very well
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this tablet, the display is decent looking for movies and such. The sensitivity of the touchscreen is terrible though so the keyboard doesn't work very well. Occasionally the tablet will crash also because there isn't a lot of ram inside of it. On top of the occasional crashing it sometimes will randomly shut off. I assume it's because the screen gets really bright and hot, either way though you get what you pay for when you buy this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Lemmers

customer_reviews.title: worse than it's predecessor, no gps, crashes all the time.
customer_reviews.text: i had this for only one day and returned it. first and foremost it doesn't have a gps chip so I could not use it for navigation, I had assumed it had because my original Venue 2013 had a good gps! but that one is dead now. second it keeps crashing. but I have to give credit to screen quality. so my advice: good for kids up to 7.
customer_reviews.author: kamran

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tablet.  Arrived when advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little tablet, but it is a definite step down in processing power from my Nexus 10 (but this also cost way less than my Nexus 10). Apart from the slight lag in app startups, this is a great little device. I like the SD card slot so I can increase my storage capacity. Screen resolution is great. Very satisfied with this purchase, very good bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cowand

customer_reviews.title: the dell venue 8 slash ( new version ) really sucks! get the old version it's better all the way around DO NOT get the new versi
customer_reviews.text: This product was very much a load of crap! It didn't work right and kept on going crazy every time I tried to swipe or tap on something, if you want a dell venue 8 I wouldn't get the new version I would stick to the old version. BUT IT IS NOT THE SELLERS FAULT THAT THE TABLET DID NOT WORK, IT'S DELL'S FAULT FOR MAKING A TABLET THAT HAS A BAD MOTHER BOARD,AS A MATTER OF FACT I GIVE THE SELLER 5 STARS B-CUZ THE SHIPMENT SPEED WAS FAST AND CAME BE BEFORE THE ESTIMATED DELIVERY DATE.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Arce

customer_reviews.title: it looks great but freezes up at most programs
customer_reviews.text: it looks great but freezes up at most programs ,,, it does web searches farely good then takes all day to do the next thing if it will do it at all .. i am kinda disipointed in the tablet i thought i was getting something better then this one ,, i am used to useing computers ,, iguess dell has to make them better i use to trust dell products feling bad about this buy ,, sorry i am just disapointed
customer_reviews.author: john cross

customer_reviews.title: Runs YouTube and Netflix... and not much else
customer_reviews.text: Something is badly wrong with this tablet's setup. Apps that run smoothly on vastly lower-spec'd android devices lag, hang and crash constantly on this one. The 2013 Nexus 7 outperforms it in every way. I've tried disabling as many background apps as possible, but it doesn't make any difference. I'm hoping that rooting it will help. Unless you want to explore your limits of frustration, avoid this like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: Bugaloo

customer_reviews.title: Great low cost tablet
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised about all the 1-start reviews. I bought this as a cheap tablet when it was on offer by Amazon and it has been great. Does all the things you need a tablet to do; email, web, stream movies, talk on Skype, run apps, etc. With an excellent diplay, I can't see much better than this in the sub $100 price range.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: The Dell Venue 7 was perfect for her due to being so easy for her ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my mother-in-law who needed a replacement for a Nextbook tablet that lasted only 14 months. The Dell Venue 7 was perfect for her due to being so easy for her to use. From the cool red color to the brightness of the screen and seamless movement from page to page, she was delighted and the tablet has performed wonderfully. Great Dell performance!!
customer_reviews.author: Conservative

customer_reviews.title: Frequently freezes; slow to load.
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful device with a bright display and decent battery life. However, it is usually slow to load and freezes up frequently (asking me if I want to Wait, Report or Close), particularly with web browsers (I have used Firefox, Dolphin and Chrome) and with graphics-rich apps such as News Republic, Flipboard and News Hog. My comparison is a 2-year old Nook HD that, regrettably , is no longer available and is suffering battery death.
customer_reviews.author: Drewgator

customer_reviews.title: It becomes slow for no apparent reason, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: It becomes slow for no apparent reason, but it seems that this problem is widespread. Dell must remove it from the market immediately. Please do not buy, it is to throw your money away and getting into trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Sempértegui Pérez

customer_reviews.title: Ok tablet but software is abysmal
customer_reviews.text: Very well built hardware (from the last week of use), buuut the software that is installed is out of control. This device has 1GB of RAM installed and on the initial boot up has less than 30% available. Comparable Android tablets running over 4.0 have only 20-40% used. This is unacceptable of a device with only 1GB of RAM. Save your time and get a Nexus device or a Kindle Fire tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Heinemann

customer_reviews.title: This tablet doesnt even deserve one star. It crashed ...
customer_reviews.text: This tablet doesnt even deserve one star. It crashed constantly. When it worked it was extremely sluggish. I had a replacement sent from Dell and it had the exact same problems.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Find a better one, not this one.
customer_reviews.text: Lags like a boss. Takes forever to load the browser. I wanted it just as a reader, but even that appears to be too much of a task for this tablet. I should have read the reviews beforehand. I am the not-so-proud owner of a $150 paperweight...
customer_reviews.author: cMic

customer_reviews.title: Tablet run like the cpu is at 100%
customer_reviews.text: Havent had issue with any android tablet, this is the first. Tablet run like the cpu is at 100%, constant lagging. Launch chrome freeze the tablet completely, just have to wait for the message "app is not responding..." Dell is a good brand, nice tablet, not working for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny Do

customer_reviews.title: Bad performance
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. 1gb ram is not enough to have a good performance. I have to clean up cache several times a day, the screen freezes frequently, and it is not allowed to move applications to the SD card. I had a Dell Venue 7 that worked so good that encouraged me to buy this new version. Never thought it will have less ram.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Pino

customer_reviews.title: Non-operational Upon Arrival.  I Returned It.
customer_reviews.text: Then review title says it all. The "refurbished and tested" unit didn't work on arrival. I didn't even bother with replacements or repairs since the warranty period is so short. Don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Breakaway Farm

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk
customer_reviews.text: The tablet failed three times. The first 2 times they replaced the motherboard. The 3rd time I am fighting with them for a refund. This is a piece of junk. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: SHS#7

customer_reviews.title: Crashes Frequently
customer_reviews.text: It kind of works, I guess, if you don't need a lot out of a tablet. Only does one thing at once and it still lags and apps occasionally crash during regular use. You cannot use chrome to browse if you ever look at more than one tab or the app will crash. Even in other browsers the keyboard will flicker. If you do buy it you need to immediately delete/disable all bloatware and only install what you need. It just cannot perform the way it should. Streaming is fine but that is just about it, if that is all you want then get it on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Dell waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge disappointment... It couldn't run smooth, it constantly glitches. money back ASAP After every in loaded. Keyboard didn't work properly. My old tablet worked better. Sorry no more Dell Tablets. .
customer_reviews.author: Carp

customer_reviews.title: save yourself the headache, and get a different tablet
customer_reviews.text: apparently they cut the RAM in half, and not it cant handle the google applications. its glitchey, the keyboard will constantly disappear when trying to type, and its very, very slow. customer support is no help, but they are aware of the problem. they will have you disable google chrome and do a hard reboot of the tablet, which does nothing. do yourself a favor and pay the extra money for a better tablet!!
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: I did not expect such a slow tablet. My ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect such a slow tablet. My prior Samsung tablet, which I had for years, was lightning fast. This one is painfully slow. Will be using it only for offline reading of Pocket saved articles and books on trips.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, good device.
customer_reviews.text: HD screen is good, Tablet looks nice, speaker is loud. For this low price for an 8 in tablet. This is a good deal. 1gb ram can't expect much. As long as it is not running two or more heavy apps at the same time, I got no issue with it at all. I usually run one app at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Dryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for me. I only use it for some games, Pinterest, and FB. Good price for simple use. Would not recommend if you want to do more than what I listed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Screen breaks too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Screen cracked while in my laptop bag. Didn't drop it or squash the bag. Only had it a few weeks before it broke. After the screen broke, the touch input on the screen won't work either so the device is now worthless to me. There was also a 6" ipad and a Microsoft Surface in the bag with it, and none of these suffered any damage.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Being a Dell product I expected a lot... it performs extremely slow and alot of glitches. The only thing I can really do with it is listen to music and occasionally watch YouTube or download movies from play store. Im very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: like or dislike?

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the tablet mainly as a reader. Not very fast in fact it is slow and inclined to freeze up. The worst is the crack that just appeared across the screen one evening. Not sure if this is an issue with the thinner lighter model or what but it is fairly useless with a cracked screen.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Mills

customer_reviews.title: The performance is terrible. And
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS MODEL!! The performance is terrible. And, I've only owned it for 6 months and have had to return it back TWICE for the same problem. The tablet suddenly stops recognizing the charger, so it doesn't charge at all. After further research, this is a common issue with Dell tablets. Each time, they reset the tablet back to the factory settings causing me to reload everything. Very frustrating. I can only hope that after the 2nd time, it will be fixed permanently before the warranty runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Mechele

customer_reviews.title: We tried a few of the recommended fix but no luck
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Dell products but, unfortunately, not this one. Bought it for my wife and she had nothing but problems. Apps were incredibly slow to load and it would hang up frequently. We tried a few of the recommended fix but no luck. Returned it and went with the Fire HD 7, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: D Lief

customer_reviews.title: Nice paperweight.
customer_reviews.text: Not what was advertised. Supposed to by 16G memory, only has 8G per Dell. It was supposed to be newest version but is not. Just informed by Dell that this unit's warranty expired 10/27/14, which was prior to my purchase and receipt of in December of 2014. After only 9 months the unit has suffered a "fatal error" in that the com.dell.devicesetup has stopped working. No way to reboot. Nice paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use tablet
customer_reviews.text: Its a Dell. That's usually enough. Its a lightweight, easy to use tablet. I picked it out for my mom, and she's very happy with it. Kit Kat OS has a few bugs to work out, but they are not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a General Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Well, the product itself is fine. But it does tend to freeze up often when trying to do too much, but that was about what I expected since ts not really a computer, but a tablet.
customer_reviews.author: M-T_Z

customer_reviews.title: Great price, buggy device
customer_reviews.text: The price was wonderful. I figured Dell produces a decent product. Beats knock off Chinese sub budget tablets. I was wrong. As mentioned by previous reviewers, simply using a web browser makes the entire tablet lock up. Hulu/Netflix type media consumption works well, but, don't expect any kind of productivity work on this device.
customer_reviews.author: brian8860

customer_reviews.title: Screen freezes frequently
customer_reviews.text: The screen (Chrome, etc.) constantly freezes. Very buggy adnd very annoying! The Venue 7 I purchased last year was much better xept that the charge port broke which is why I purchased a new one. I would not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the sound is very good and the screen is very nitida
customer_reviews.text: The ram is low, the processor is slow to multitask but if one thing at a time works very well done, gt racing 2 runs very smooth, the sound is very good and the screen is very nitida. Good product. Not as fast as a nexus 7, but very comfortable to read for its 8-inch screen.
customer_reviews.author: javier mejias

customer_reviews.title: ... it and haven't seen it since must be a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Same thing neighbor borrowed it and haven't seen it since must be a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first time I thought maybe it was just a bad item. When the same thing happened to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these devices sequentially. In both cases the USB charging port has become inoperable within a few months and the devices will no longer charge. The first time I thought maybe it was just a bad item. When the same thing happened to the next purchase I was very annoyed. Its very frustrating. I will not buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't even bother to game with it because that's even worst.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this tab. It freezes constantly while doing simple things such as web browsing, using Facebook app, using Facebook messenger app, playing movies. Don't even bother to game with it because that's even worst.
customer_reviews.author: N. Ram

customer_reviews.title: It is not intuitive, at least for me.
customer_reviews.text: I still haven't been able to use all the functions on this tablet. I would like it better if it had an instruction book instead of having to look it up on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wade

customer_reviews.title: The one we bought directly from Dell was excellent. Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Slow, crashes, it can't even handle Facebook. The one we bought directly from Dell was excellent. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gamer #2

customer_reviews.title: Good tablet great display good perfomance only downside tablet description ...
customer_reviews.text: Good tablet great display good perfomance only downside tablet description stated that it would take SD cards upto 64gs Tablet will not read a 64 gig card
customer_reviews.author: Roden Shaw

customer_reviews.title: This is my first tablet and I am learning how ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet and I am learning how to use one but I am enjoying it very much!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Bad Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, it would no longer turn on only 2 months after purchase. After calling dell customer support, I was instructed to pay for shipping and send to them.... I took it as a loss because I am not paying for anything if it broke after 2 months! Horrible product DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie

customer_reviews.title: A lagging tablet... Dell is behind in the game.
customer_reviews.text: The tablet lags. Have to frequently restart. Applications get stuck. Still on Kit-kat. Updates come once a blue moon, wonder if there is a Dell dev team at all. Interface not customizeable. Bloatware not uninstallable. Camera is unusable, takes a good 3 seconds to capture a pic after click event. Like the sleek design and HW solid build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Zenia Thebuwana

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My son bought himself this tablet and loves it. It was a good price for all the specs it has.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hanchett

customer_reviews.title: Good for price but can be better.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice little tablet that works just fine. It has loads of Dell bloatware that are a little annoying​. Performance is okay for the cost of the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Yash Mathur

customer_reviews.title: other reviews seemed to have same problem other than those issues I kind of liked the tablet
customer_reviews.text: this tablet would constantly freeze up. very slow to reach apps.lose email pictures for no reason. don't know why it performed so poorly.other reviews seemed to have same problem other than those issues I kind of liked the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: jimi k

customer_reviews.title: very disapointed
customer_reviews.text: So disapointed in this tablet. It is supposed to be a larger version of my smart phone. It is so slow and freezes up more than it works. Very glad I didn't get it for important business. Having difficult time getting the kendle app to work. The case is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joan B. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good product for about 9months then the charge port broke
customer_reviews.text: Good product for about 9months then the charge port broke! Dell wont fix it as it they claim it was refurbished...
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: the screen resolution is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my daughter as a replacement for a much older tablet. She loves it. the screen resolution is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: WebGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Great android dell tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great, it meets or exceeds all my expectations and you can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bearickx

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet with good screen resolution.
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet. I would like it to have more RAM but works fine generally. Screen resolution is great, e.g., it is excellent fro for NETFLIX & FLICKR apps.
customer_reviews.author: Leopoldo Estrada

customer_reviews.title: I only use this tablet for running Square transactions at ...
customer_reviews.text: I only use this tablet for running Square transactions at my store, but I have yet to have a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think its a rather slow... something ...
customer_reviews.text: I think its a rather slow... something that i notice is google chrome is slower than the already browser... so i uninstalled it... I am thinking to reset it....
customer_reviews.author: Yiannis Sarigiannis

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with my Tablet.
customer_reviews.text: Not Happy, this tablet freezes all the time and it is very slow. I thought buying a dell, I was getting a great product. Very sad. I bought a screen protector and the extra warrantee. Im out more than $170, I would never had bought this. Im heartbroken.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The product never worked after the warranty expired. Stuck at dell logo.
customer_reviews.author: Nistala

customer_reviews.title: PRO inexpensive CON runs Google's Android which invades privacy & ...
customer_reviews.text: PRO inexpensive CON runs Google's Android which invades privacy & does too much marketing CON lots of Play Store apps do not work CON slow CON Firefox & other apps crash often CON can not Remove Apps Google hass in default install
customer_reviews.author: L. Tower Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for dell
customer_reviews.text: First one worked great but this updated one is too slow for a Dell and frequently locks up and hangs on wifi. Reset multiple times giving it to kids to see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando R.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tablet. The screen is locked after using for a while.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible tablet, After a week of use, the screen locks. and touch stops working. Definitely a waste of money. In addition, the package came broken.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Performing according to specs but Bluetooth is not working so far
customer_reviews.text: This my third venue (the first 2 had their screen broken by accident). It performs as expected according to its specs. I am having problems with connecting via Bluetooth. I am still trying to figure it out, if it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: IFBrasil

customer_reviews.title: Works great with Blade 350QX and CGO2 camera.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my Blade 350qx3 and cgo2 camera. It works excellent for this, sees the AP on the quadcopter instantly and connects using the password or 1234567890. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse L.

customer_reviews.title: i
customer_reviews.text: Very exasperating experience with this item. Continual freezing and slow moving , stop and go I got out of it when I removed Google Chrome. Now, it works very well. Very good value for money without chrome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: slow
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this tablet. Bought the galaxy tab s and love it
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this tablet was very slow so i returned it and bought a kindle fire
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain device
customer_reviews.text: Bargain tablet, works great. I need a tablet for game playing, and I gave a niece my Nexus 7 then promptly broke my Archos 10" (I loved that thing). The Dell is a great bargain tablet. 4.4.4 with a 5.0 update on the way, per Dell. The screen is amazing truly. Sound is okay, and wireless and operation is good. The OS skin is minimal, and while I usually root and look for custom ROMs I don't think I'll need to with this. I'm happy with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Martin

customer_reviews.title: locks up easily and very slow to recharge
customer_reviews.text: Very slow, locks up easily and very slow to recharge. I wish for once i would have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It is exceptionally good for the the price great hd screen
customer_reviews.text: It is exceptionally good for the the price great hd screen , the video playing is almost very good with little lagging, there will be problem in playing games as the ram is very low.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: GREAT tablet at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tablet for the price!!! Would recommend to my family and friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Levers-Waby

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: one of the worse tablets I ever used, listen to the reviews, it is slower than hell
customer_reviews.author: Anton L.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kinda slow reaction time. Freezes sometimes when on internet. SD card slot useless. Not usable with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: lou steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Not designed well
customer_reviews.text: 1gb ram is not able to handle the process. Without even a single new applicatuon installation, it started with 76% ram usage and that frozes your tab every now and then. Disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: Mahendra Singh

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst tablet ever. Freeze and lag in all application. Do not waste your money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Oancea

customer_reviews.title: Constantly freezes up and I am unable to do the ...
customer_reviews.text: Constantly freezes up and I am unable to do the most basic internet searches. Only wanted the tablet to have in my living room to browse the internet from time to time. It's now in a drawer and I am not sure I will ever use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Andersen

customer_reviews.title: This was for my 82-year-old mother, so I needed ...
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 82-year-old mother, so I needed something user friendly. She is managing to navigate it and is enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy I. Okimoto

customer_reviews.title: Execellent!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my girlfriend and she is so happy with it! Good processor and an excellent display resolution!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Levay

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. It couldn't run more than one app at a time and was not working properly
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hester

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet sucks! Don't buy it. I bought it and wanted to replace my Venue 7 2G RAM version for the Camera and passed the time to return this one. This one is useless and too slow!
customer_reviews.author: Weidong Yang

customer_reviews.title: It was supposed to have 2G of ram memory. ...
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to have 2G of ram memory. This only has 1. That was very important to me.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Wright

customer_reviews.title: Small price, Premium experience.
customer_reviews.text: A great Tablet and a great price. My wife and I have the first gen of this tablet so we felt good about getting this one for our daughter for Christmas. We all took a try at it and we love it. Great android experience with Kit Kat 4.4 . Great high def screen and plenty of power. Works smoothly and does as good as any of the top tablets out there. Don't tell Dell though or they might start charging more. I recommend this tab for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are junk dont waste your money they crash bad
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this great tablet for my fiance, she loves it, and now I want one LOL.
customer_reviews.author: BHARRIS0122

customer_reviews.title: Nice Used Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived ahead of schedule in excellent outward appearance. Unit works OK, but power button kind of flakey, and battery seems to run down quickly. A good second hand back up tablet.
customer_reviews.author: ted Erne

customer_reviews.title: not ready for prime time
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my wife, who reported that it would not load her banking app & froze up frequently while running Chrome. She concluded it is a great concept but Dell needs more experience with the android OS to iron out the bugs. It has been returned. Amazon's automated system worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: Zero rating... Gets hanged too often without having any major app running.. I have Returned it in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: Vivek Goel
